# {{< iconify fluent-emoji-high-contrast detective >}} Knowledge {.tabset .tabset-fade .tabset-pills .break} 



<blockquote class="question-text">
 How good are people at knowledge questions? Scale 1:29.

</blockquote>

::: {.panel-tabset}

## Algemeen

```{r}
var_labels <- c(
  "Knowledge Score"
)

thevarlabs <- var_labels

categories_dat <- c("Low (1-9)", "Middle (10-19)", "High (20-29)") %>% rev()

# debugonce(viz_general)
viz_general("MeanKnowledge", 
            var_labels, 
            categories_dat, weight_var = "weging_GAMO", 
            range1 = 1:9,
            range2 = 10:19,
            range3=20:29,stacked = F)

```

```{r}
library(dashboardr)

# create_bar automatically bins the scores!
create_bar(
  data = data,
  x_var = "MeanKnowledge",                      # Raw numeric variable
  x_breaks = c(1, 10, 20, 30),          # Bin edges
  x_bin_labels = c("Low (1-9)", "Middle (10-19)", "High (20-29)"),
  horizontal = TRUE,
  # bar_type = "percent",
  color_palette = c("#D2691E", "#4682B4", "#228B22"),
  x_order = c("Low (1-9)", "Middle (10-19)", "High (20-29)")
)


```
